text: The flag of London is flag of the English area of London. ==Desing== The flag of the City of London is based on the flag of England, having a centred red St George's Cross on a white background, with the red sword in the upper hoist canton (the top left quarter). The sword is believed to represent the sword that beheaded Saint Paul, who is the patron saint of the city. == References == Category:Flags of the United Kingdom Category:County flags Category:London
title: Flag of London
